title: Biden tries to get Democrats rowing in the same direction
description: Biden’s agenda on the line as Democrats jockey over government funding and the debt limit. Garrett Haake, newly minted Senior Capitol Hill correspondent, with NBC News correspondents Leigh Ann Caldwell and Ali Vitali.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
